articles.title: West African Countries Take a Step Away From Colonial-Era Currency
articles.description: A bloc of eight countries will rename their French-backed currency and France will scrap a contentious requirement for reserve deposits.
articles.content:
Like its predecessor, the Eco will be pegged to the euro, which advocates of the C.F.A. said gave it stability.
Abolishing the C.F.A. franc has long been a demand of activists across the region. Opponents have demonstrated against the currency, which is seen… [+1046 chars]

articles.author: Edward Wong
articles.title: Pentagon Aid to Ukraine Was Frozen Right After Trump Spoke With Country’s Leader
articles.description: Emails also suggest President Trump first began asking about $250 million in Pentagon aid after a June 19 article in the Washington Examiner.
articles.content: According to the private testimony of Mark Sandy, a senior budget official, Mr. Trump began inquiring about the aid on June 19 after seeing a news report. Mr. Sandy said in a closed-door deposition before lawmakers in November that he learned of Mr. Trumps de… [+1843 chars]

articles.author: Sarah Lyall
articles.title: How Trump Made a Writer of Thrillers Stick to Facts
articles.description: Richard North Patterson wrote best-selling novels about presidents, until he decided that the political moment was too strange to make anything up.
articles.content: The 2016 presidential campaign, and the startling rise of Mr. Trump as a viable candidate, brought Mr. Patterson back to political writing, an early passion that he had put aside to work first as a lawyer and then as a novelist. (He began life as a ferocious … [+1824 chars]

articles.title: Faulkner Carries W. Carolina Past Tennessee Tech 89-76Faulkner Carries W. Carolina Past Tennessee Tech 89-76 - The New York Times
articles.description: Faulkner Carries W. Carolina Past Tennessee Tech 89-76Faulkner Carries W. Carolina Past Tennessee Tech 89-76 The New York Times
articles.content:
COOKEVILLE, Tenn. Mason Faulkner recorded 16 points and 10 rebounds to lift Western Carolina to an 89-76 win over Tennessee Tech on Saturday.
Matt Halvorsen added 15 points for Western Carolina (8-3), including a 3-pointer 48 seconds into the game for a lead… [+411 chars]

articles.description: Amorie Archibald scored 14 points and Louisiana Tech breezed to an 87-47 victory over NAIA-member Southern-New Orleans on Saturday.
articles.content:
RUSTON, La. Amorie Archibald scored 14 points and Louisiana Tech breezed to an 87-47 victory over NAIA-member Southern-New Orleans on Saturday.
